card.name: A-Earthquake Dragon
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of Dragons you control not named A-Earthquake Dragon.Flying, trample{2}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Return A-Earthquake Dragon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: A-Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Book, create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.

card.name: A-Sepulcher Ghoul
card.text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Assassin
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Mastermind
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Scout
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, perpetually gets +1/+1.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Swashbuckler
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Alora, Cheerful Thief
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand. If you do, a creature of your choice an opponent controls perpetually gets -1/-0.

card.name: Alora, Rogue Companion
card.text: Specialize {2}Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Ancient Brass Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with total mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

card.name: Arcane Archery
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach and trample until end of turn.You get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter, reach counter, and trample counter on it."

card.name: Calim, Djinn Emperor
card.text: FlyingWard {2}Calim's Breath — {1}{U}, Discard Calim: Tap up to one target nonland permanent. Draw a card. Then you may exile two other cards named Calim, Djinn Emperor from your graveyard. When you do, return Calim, Djinn Emperor from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.When you discard Calim, conjure a card named Calim, Djinn Emperor into your library seventh from the top.

card.name: Champions of Tyr
card.text: FlyingDouble teamWhen Champions of Tyr enters the battlefield you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter, a flying counter, or a lifelink counter on it."

card.name: Chaos Balor
card.text: FlyingWhenever Chaos Balor attacks or dies, choose two. Each mode must target a different player.• Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then seeks that many nonland cards.• Chaos Balor deals 2 damage to target player and they create two Treasure tokens.• Chaos Balor deals 2 damage to each creature target player controls. Those creatures perpetually get +2/+0.

card.name: Craving of Yeenoghu
card.text: Enchant creature you controlEnchanted creature gets +3/+2, has haste, and attacks each combat if able.{R}: Return Craving of Yeenoghu from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to target creature you control. Craving of Yeenoghu perpetually gains "Enchanted creature gets -1/-1." Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Dragonborn Immolator
card.text: {1}{R}: Dragonborn Immolator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.Gift of Tiamat — When Dragonborn Immolator dies, not its power. You get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +X/+0, where X is the noted number."

card.name: Earthquake Dragon
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of Dragons you control.Flying, trample{2}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Return Earthquake Dragon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Farideh's Fireball
card.text: Farideh's Fireball deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Roll a d20.1—9 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each player.10—20 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Favored Enemy
card.text: As Favored Enemy enters the battlefield, note the most prevalent creature type in an opponent's library.When Favored Enemy enters the battlefield, target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.Whenever a creature an opponent controls of the noted type dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Flames of Moradin
card.text: Destroy up to three target artifacts. Conjure a duplicate of each nontoken artifact destroyed this way into your hand. The duplicates perpetually gain "You may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost" and "at the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this artifact."

card.name: Flaming Fist Duskguard
card.text: When Flaming Fist Duskguard enters the battlefield, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +1/+0."

card.name: Follow the Tracks
card.text: Conjure a card of your choice from Follow the Track's spellbook onto the battlefield.

card.name: Gate of the Black Dragon
card.text: Gate of the Black Dragon enters the battlefield tapped.{3}{B}, {T}: Seek a nonland card. Activate only once.{T}: Add {B}.

card.name: Gate to Manorborn
card.text: Gate to Manorborn enters the battlefield tapped.{3}{G}, {T}: Seek a nonland card. Activate only once.{T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Gate to Seatower
card.text: Gate to Seatower enters the battlefield tapped.{3}{U}, {T}: Seek a nonland card. Activate only once.{T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Gate to Tumbledown
card.text: Gate to Tumbledown enters the battlefield tapped.{3}{R}, {T}: Seek a nonland card. Activate only once.{T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Gate to the Citadel
card.text: Gate to the Citadel enters the battlefield tapped.{3}{W}, {T}: Seek a nonland card. Activate only once.{T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Genasi Rabble-Rouser
card.text: Double team{1}{R}: Creatures you control named Genasi Rabble-Rouser gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Fire Beetles
card.text: MenaceDouble team

card.name: Gnoll Hunting Party
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.Double teamAs long as its your turn, Gnoll Hunting Party has first strike.

card.name: Grave Choice
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature. If that creature had mana value 2 or less, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand. That duplicate perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

card.name: Hook Horror
card.text: Molting Exoskeleton — When Hook Horror dies, it perpetually gets -1/-1. Then if that card's toughness is 1 or greater, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Hypnotic Pattern
card.text: Target creature perpetually gets -2/-0.Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Incessant Provocation
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. It perpetually gains "This creature attacks each combat if able."

card.name: Irenicus's Vile Duplication
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except the token has flying and it isn't legendary if that creature is legendary.

card.name: Jon Irenicus, the Exile
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your library has more cards in it than target opponent's library. Otherwise, each opponent mills five cards.

card.name: Kardum, Patron of Flames
card.text: HasteWhenever Kardum, Patron of Flames attacks, put a flame counter on it, then seek a card with mana value equal to the number of flame counters on it and exile that card face down.When Kardum dies, put all cards you own exiled with it into your hand. At the beginning of the end step of your next turn, discard those cards.

card.name: Kobold Warcaller
card.text: {T}: Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains haste.

card.name: Liara of the Flaming Fist
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, each creature you control get +1/+1 until end of turn if it has the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard.{1}{R}{W}: Another target nontoken creature you control gains first strike and double team until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Lizardfolk Librarians
card.text: Double teamWhen Lizardfolk Librarians enters the battlefield, scry 2.

card.name: Mace of Disruption
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has protection from Demons and from Devils. Whenever equipped creature attacks, it perpetually gets +1/+0 if it has the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard.Equip {1}

card.name: Mephit's Enthusiasm
card.text: Mephit's Enthusiasm deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, note that excess damage, then you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +x/+0, where X is the noted number."

card.name: Mind Spike
card.text: Target opponent reveals each noncreature, nonland card in their hand. You choose a card revealed this way. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life. If they didn't reveal a card this way, you draw a card.

card.name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

card.name: Minthara of the Absolute
card.text: Starting intensity 0Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is Minthara of the Absolute's intensity.Whenever one or more permanents you control leave the battlefield, perpetually increase Minthara's intensity and the intensity of cards named Minthara of the Absolute in your hand, graveyard, and library by 1. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Moradin's Disciples
card.text: Double teamWhenever Moradin's Disciples attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Oyaminartok, Polar Werebear
card.text: Oyaminartok, Polar Werebear has hexproof if it hasn't dealt damage yet.Whenever Oyaminartok deals combat damage to a player, create a Food token.{U}, Sacrifice a Food: Draft a card from Oyaminartok's spellbook. When you do, add {U}{U}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast blue creature spells.

card.name: Patriar's Humiliation
card.text: Target creature perpetually loses all abilities, then Patriar's Humiliation deals damage to it equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Portable Hole
card.text: When Portable Hole enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Portable Hole leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Prosper, Tome-Bound
card.text: DeathtouchMystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.Pact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Ranger Squadron
card.text: FlyingDouble team

card.name: Seatower Imprisonment
card.text: Enchant creature or planeswalker you don't controlWhen Seatower Imprisonment enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Soldiers of the Watch onto the battlefield.Enchanted permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Seek New Knowledge
card.text: Seek two nonland cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Sepulcher Ghoul
card.text: Sacrifice another creature: Sepulcher Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Sewer Plague
card.text: Target creature an opponent controls perpetually gets -2/-2 and gains "at the beginning of each upkeep, this creature perpetually gets -1/-1."

card.name: Signature Spells
card.text: When Signature Spells enters the battlefield, seek two instant and/or sorcery cards with mana value 3, then exile them.At the beginning of your upkeep, you may copy a card exiled with Signature Spells. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Snowborn Simulacra
card.text: Conjure a duplicate of each of X target nontoken permanents into your hand. Those cards perpetually gain "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell." If X is 5 or more, you may put one of them from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Soldiers of the Watch
card.text: Double team

card.name: Stroke of Luck
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Choose one of them and put all cards with the same name as the chosen card from among them into your hand. You lose 1 life for each card put into your hand this way. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Sune's Intervention
card.text: Choose one or more —• Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens.• Seek a nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less.• Destroy target artifact.• Destroy target enchantment• Target player gains 3 life.

card.name: Sworn to the Legion
card.text: When Sworn to the Legion enters the battlefield, nontoken creatures you control perpetually gain double team.Whenever you cast a creature spell, it perpetually gains double tema.

card.name: Tasha, Unholy Archmage
card.text: +1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature attacks you or Tasha, Unholy Archmage, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.−2: Target opponent puts a creature card of their choice from their graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature gains ward {2}.−6: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal three creature cards. Put those cards into the battlefield under your control. That player puts the rest into their graveyard.

card.name: Thayan Evokers
card.text: Double teamWhen Thayan Evokers enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Lighting Bolt into your hand, then discard a card.Whenever you conjure one or more cards, put a +1/+1 counter on Thayan Evokers.

card.name: The Hourglass Coven
card.text: When The Hourglass Coven enters the battlefield, draft a card from The Hourglass Coven's spellbook twice, then put those cards onto the battlefield.Other Warlocks you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Tiefling Outcasts
card.text: Double teamOther Demons, Devils, Imps, and Tieflings you control +1/+0.

card.name: Ulder Ravengard, Marshal
card.text: When Ulder Ravengard, Marshal enters the battlefield, another target nontoken creature you control gains double team until end of turn.Whenever Ulder Ravengard attacks, conjure a duplicate of another target nontoken attacking creature into your hand.

card.name: Undersimplify
card.text: Choose target spell. If it's a creature spell, it perpetually gets -2/-0. Counter that spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Unexpected Allies
card.text: Target nontoken creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains double team until end of turn. It also gains first strike until end of turn if it has the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Uthgardt Fury
card.text: When Uthgardt Fury enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to any target.Damage isn't removed from creature your opponents control during cleanup steps.

card.name: Valiant Farewell
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +2/+0."Draw a card.

card.name: Verdant Rejuvenation
card.text: Seek X creature, enchantment, and/or planeswalker cards, where X is the highest mana value among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield.

card.name: Vladimir and Godfrey
card.text: Rejuvenation — {2}{W}: Return Vladimir and Godfrey from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. It perpetually gets +1/+1. Activate only if you control a 1/1 creature.

card.name: Warriors of Tiamat
card.text: HasteDouble team

card.name: Water Weird
card.text: Whenever Water Weird deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on Water Weird if the top card your library is a nonland card. Otherwise, you may mill a card.

card.name: Wizened Githzerai
card.text: Psionic Adept — Whenever Wizened Githzerai becomes blocked by a creature, that creature perpetually gets -2/-0.

card.name: You Come to a River
card.text: Choose one —• Fight the Current — Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.• Find a Crossing — Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: You Line Up the Shot
card.text: Choose one —• Aim for the Wyvern — Conjure a card named Plummet into your hand.• Aim for the Cursed Amulet — Conjure a card named Naturalize into your hand.• Fire a Warning Shot — Draw a card.

card.name: Yuan-Ti Scaleshield
card.text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.Seek a creature card if an opponent has cast a spell with mana value 3 or less this turn.
